Package org.acme.database

Class TableAccess<T>

java.lang.Object
org.acme.database.DataAccess<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the entity.
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
@Component public class TableAccess<T> extends Object implements AutoCloseable
This class provides access to the database tables. It uses the EntityManager to interact with the database. It also uses the AtomicTable class to log the access to the tables.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
See Also:

  • AtomicTable
